info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:49PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Macon and southern Jackson Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 749 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Franklin, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cullowhee, Cashiers, Lake Glenville, Ellijay, Tuckasegee, Wolf Mountain, Cullasaja, Whiteside Mountain and Sapphire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
